weekly_top_story.headline: Connecticut Faces Healthcare and Food Assistance Crisis Amid Federal Cuts
weekly_top_story.summary: Tens of thousands of Connecticut residents are at risk of losing healthcare and food assistance due to federal policy changes and a government shutdown, prompting urgent calls for state intervention.

stories.headline: Governor Murphy Proclaims November 3, 2025 as One Health Day in New Jersey
stories.summary: New Jersey officially recognizes One Health Day, highlighting the state's leadership in integrating human, animal, and environmental health through new legislation and strategic planning.

stories.headline: Johnson & Johnson Showcases Latest Advancements in Pulsed Field Ablation for Atrial Fibrillation
stories.summary: Johnson & Johnson MedTech presents new clinical and real-world evidence for its pulsed field ablation technology, advancing treatment options for complex cardiac arrhythmias.

stories.headline: Omani Patients Gain Direct Access to Malaysian Medical Specialists Through Healthcare Activation
stories.summary: A new healthcare initiative in Oman connects patients with Malaysian medical specialists, expanding international collaboration and access to specialized care.
